<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the target has spilled this register to another register, we don&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CS.isSpilledToReg())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FrameIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a>-&gt;hasReservedSpillSlot(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, FrameIdx)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check to see if this physreg must be spilled to a particular stack slot</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on this target.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetframelowering/spillslot">TargetFrameLowering::SpillSlot</a> &#42;FixedSlot = FixedSpillSlots;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FixedSlot != FixedSpillSlots + NumFixedSpillSlots &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">             FixedSlot-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetframelowering/spillslot/#a61869c498d78ea441c973525fbaf2af8">Reg</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++FixedSlot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a>-&gt;getSpillSize(&#42;RC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FixedSlot == FixedSpillSlots + NumFixedSpillSlots) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Nope, just spill it anywhere convenient.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/structs/reginfo">RegInfo</a>-&gt;getSpillAlign(&#42;RC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We may not be able to satisfy the desired alignment specification of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the TargetRegisterClass if the stack alignment is smaller. Use the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// min.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">        Alignment = std::min(Alignment, TFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a74d93035f53f5e8c2aaea5a8f307972d">getStackAlign</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">        FrameIdx = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a1ae307f415a8989475e3f7ddd6eefc8b">CreateStackObject</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, Alignment, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are fixed sized objects that are preallocated in the local area,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t FixedOff;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StackGrowsDown) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The maximum distance from the stack pointer is at lower address of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the object -- which is given by offset. For down growing stack</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the offset is negative, so we negate the offset to get the distance.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">      FixedOff = -MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(i);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The maximum distance from the start pointer is at the upper</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// address of the object.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">      FixedOff = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(i) + MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a9284fd53296d2a2f8ae654d000971000">getObjectSize</a>(i);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FixedOff &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = FixedOff;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1540"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Some instructions (e.g. inline asm instructions) can have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1541"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// multiple frame indices and/or cause eliminateFrameIndex</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1542"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to insert more than one instruction. We need the register</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scavenger to go through all of these instructions so that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1544"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it can update its register information. We keep the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
